title: Grizzly bear cub

properties.name: description
properties.value: A grizzly bear cub is a smaller version of a grizzly bear (level 42) in the forests of Isafdar. They are always found near larger grizzly bears.

A grizzly bear cub is a smaller version of a grizzly bear (level 42) in the forests of Isafdar. They are always found near larger grizzly bears.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
    • 2.2 Tertiary
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map

Isafdar33, 364Maplink
Prifddinas (Outside the city)33, 363Maplink
West of Lletya (during Song of the Elves)33, 362Maplink
North-east of Tyras Camp (Instanced)331Maplink

Drops[edit | edit source]

The following drop rates are provided by Jagex, unless otherwise specified.

100%[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bones1Always770
Bear fur1Always1206
Raw bear meat1Always4700

Tertiary[edit | edit source]

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Bear ribs1Always[d 1]Not soldN/A
Ensouled bear head11/25713156
Clue scroll (beginner)11/90Not sold12
  1. ^ Bear ribs are only dropped during Rag and Bone Man I.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 July â€“
19 September 2005

The NPCs' combat levels were increased from 19, to 33 and 36.
